name: Dirty Dirty Pirates
description:
You're a dirty scallywag with nothing to lose. Dirty Dirty Pirates is a fast-paced, chaotic, player versus player fighting game, where fast reflexes and improvisation will help you become victorious. Stab, throw, roll, dance, mount, catch, and smash your way through frenzied battles in a looped battleground and enjoy the hilarious brutality.

LOCAL-MULTIPLAYER MAYHEM

Brawl with 2-4 players in a top down, blood-soaked, pirate battleground not for the faint of heart.

CHAOTIC LOOPED BATTLEGROUND

You and your thrown weapons wrap around the level, creating chaotic ways to slay your enemies (or yourself)!

POUNCE AND EXECUTE

Mount a downed pirate and choose your killing method.

GRATIFYING KILL CAMS

Watch the final kill of the match in slow motion and celebrate the brutality.

WEAPONS WITH A MIND OF THEIR OWN


Not only are the weapons pointy and eager to impale – but they follow you! Better hide, catch, or roll, ya buccaneer.

SLAUGHTER IN DIVERSE LANDS


Slay your foes at ship docks, ancient jungle ruins, desert, caves, and icy tundras.

CUSTOMIZE THE CHAOS


Reduce or increase the blood/gore to your liking (or disable it). Color blind mode is available as well.

Please note: This is a local multiplayer game without online gameplay. For the best experience, find a comfy couch and some friendly mateys in the same room or with Steam Remote Play.
